name: Articles List
description: Get a page of online articles for the given language and category through either search or query.

queryParams.description: Optional, Performs an SOSL search. If the query string is null, empty, or not given, an SOQL query runs.

Optional, defaults to userâ€™s context. For information on channel values, see Valid channel values.
App: Visible in the internal Salesforce Knowledge application
Pkb: Visible in the public knowledge base
Csp: Visible in the Customer Portal
Prm: Visible in the Partner Portal
Optional, defaults to None. Category group must be unique in each group:category pair, otherwise you get ARGUMENT_OBJECT_PARSE_ERROR
values are: AT, BELOW, ABOVE, ABOVE_OR_BELOW. Only valid when categories are specified, defaults to ABOVE_OR_BELOW
Optional, a sortable field name LastPublishedDate, CreatedDate, Title, ViewScore. Defaults to LastPublishedDate for query and relevance for search.
Optional, either ASC or DESC, defaults to DESC. Valid only when sort is valid
Optional, defaults to 20. Valid range 1 to 100
